column4: I'm having some problems with the ubuntu setup - on the username/password stage, I enter the full name, username, and password (twice), and then it goes back to "enter the fullname" again
the installation finished, and now it will not let me log in because I have no account other than root
the one where you press "ENTER" on boot
does it help that it was complaining about not being able to add a password because the username did not exist?
are yo usure your cd isn't broken?
I've used it to install in the past
the username/password step is not working
and this CD HAS worked before
